title: Awkward Black Girl: District 9: Enchanted Love
description: Gina is an Awkward Girl who doesn't fit in any scene in Atlanta. She is about to turn Eighteen years old. As each hour draws closer to her birthday, she has been haunted more and more by extraordinary dreams. On the eve of her birthday, she ventures out into the heart of Atlanta. Gina Monroe finds, the more she learns about her true identity, the more she must walk the path of enchantments and mysticism. Fairytales and Demons have become a reality, and to find true love and find out her true identity, she must be ready to battle her darkest fear.
author: Elijah Powell
